snippet.title: Enlightenment Trailer
snippet.description: Enlightenment - post-apocalyptic, top-down, rouge-like  shooter.  Explore procedurally generated world, where everything is random! With sprint, roll and melee attack, Enlightenment feels like action game. With well balanced enemies, game challenging, but not frustrating.

localized.title: Enlightenment Trailer
